##  Communities {#communities}

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[International Society of Pharmacometrics (ISoP)](https://www.isop.org/home){.card-title}
A non-profit organization dedicated to the advancement and promotion of pharmacometrics globally.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[RedIF](https://www.redifar.org){.card-title}
Ibero-American network in the field of pharmacometrics, fostering collaboration across the region.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[Pharmacometrics Africa](https://pmxafrica.org){.card-title}
A non-profit developing quantitative clinical pharmacology capacity among African scientists and low/middle income countries.
:::

:::

##  Conferences {#conferences}

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[PAGE](https://www.page-meeting.org){.card-title}
Population Approach Group Europe. Held annually in June across various European cities.
[Annual 路 June]{.badge .bg-secondary .card-badge}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[ACoP](https://acop2025.eventscribe.net/index.asp){.card-title}
American Conference on Pharmacometrics. Organized annually during the fall by ISoP.
[Annual 路 Fall]{.badge .bg-secondary .card-badge}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[PAGANZ](https://www.paganz.org){.card-title}
Population Approach Group of Australia and New Zealand. Annual meeting for the Australasian region.
[Annual]{.badge .bg-secondary .card-badge}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[SUP](https://www.sup-meeting.se){.card-title}
Stockholm-Uppsala Pharmacometrics. Alternately in Stockholm (Spring) and Uppsala (Fall).
[Biannual 路 Spring/Fall]{.badge .bg-secondary .card-badge}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[PNB](https://www.pharmacometricsnetworkbenelux.org){.card-title}
Pharmacometrics Network Benelux. Biannual meeting for the Benelux region.
[Biannual 路 Spring/Fall]{.badge .bg-secondary .card-badge}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .index-card}
[ASCPT](https://www.ascpt.org){.card-title}
